name: Space Wars (itch) (Oliver Geogre)
description:
A simple game based on the classic game space wars. Battle a friend for control of the blackhole.

Controls:

Player 1

  • W - Forward
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • E - Shoo

Player 2

  • Up Arrow - Forward
  • Left Arrow - Left
  • Right Arrow - Right
  • Slash - Shoot
